description: Derived from 「Brokeback Mountain」 (断背山), the 2005 movie depicting a romance between two men. Synonyms include Jilao, Wannan, Fentao, Duanxiu, Tongzhi, Qunan, Gaoji, Jiyou, Tuzi, Nantong, Qiangweinan, Nantong.

examples.translation: The two of us are in a gay relationship.

examples.chinese: 第一次看完一部有断背情节的书籍
examples.translation: Finished reading a book with a homosexual plot for the first time.
